mapper.select: INSERT INTO IN_APPLY(IN_APPLY_NUM, USER_NUM, ST_IN_NUM, ST_IN_FILE, ST_PLACE_NUM, ST_PLACE_FILE, ST_NAME , ST_LOCATION, ST_LOCATION_DT, ST_TEL, ADMIN_READ_DATE, REG_DATE) VALUES(SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_num}, #{st_in_num}, #{st_in_file}, #{st_place_num}, #{st_place_file}, #{st_name}, #{st_location}, , #{st_location_dt}, #{st_tel}, NULL, NULL)
